mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.gongsi_id as gongsiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.qiandingheyue_file as qiandingheyueFile ,a.qiandingheyue_qixian as qiandingheyueQixian ,a.qiandingheyue_text as qiandingheyueText ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,gongsi.username as username ,gongsi.password as password ,gongsi.gongsi_name as gongsiName ,gongsi.hanye_types as hanyeTypes ,gongsi.gongsi_phone as gongsiPhone ,gongsi.gongsi_email as gongsiEmail ,gongsi.gongsi_photo as gongsiPhoto ,gongsi.gongsi_content as gongsiContent ,gongsi.gongsi_delete as gongsiDelete ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM qiandingheyue a left JOIN gongsi gongsi ON a.gongsi_id = gongsi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.gongsi_id = #{params.gongsiId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.qiandingheyue_qixian like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiandingheyueQixian},'%')
and a.qiandingheyue_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.qiandingheyueText},'%')
and a.gongsi_id IS NOT NULL
and gongsi.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and gongsi.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and gongsi.gongsi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongsiName},'%')
and gongsi.hanye_types = #{params.hanyeTypes}
and gongsi.gongsi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongsiPhone},'%')
and gongsi.gongsi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongsiEmail},'%')
and gongsi.gongsi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.gongsiContent},'%')
and gongsi.gongsi_delete >= #{params.gongsiDeleteStart}
and gongsi.gongsi_delete <= #{params.gongsiDeleteEnd}
and gongsi.gongsi_delete = #{params.gongsiDelete}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
